name: Language
description: Survival Limit +1. All survivors gain the Encourage survival action.

name: Paint
description: The settlement swells with creative energy. All survivors gain the Dash survival action.

name: Ammonia
description: A pungent, bilious substance ideal for crafting leather and treating wounds. Departing survivors gain +1 survival.

name: Symposium
description: Survival Limit +1. When a suirvivor innovates, draw an additional 2 innovation Cards to choose from.

name: Drums
description: (*) Bone Beats - roll 1d10. (1-4) Lone drummer. Gain +1 insanity. (5-8) Rythmic trance. Gain +1 survival. (9+) Remove one disorder from any survivor. Departing survivors gain +1 survival.

name: Inner Lantern
description: The settlement finds the light within. all survivors gain the Surge survival action. Surge: Once per round spend 1 survival to gain +1 (flash) and use it immediately. (See detailed rules in rulebook.)

name: Hovel
description: Survival Limit +1. The settlement accepts this nightmarish landscape as their home. Departing survivors gain +1 survival.

name: Bloodletting
description: (*) Breathing a Vein - spend 1 resource and roll 1d10. (1-3) Gain +1 understanding. Lose all survival. You cannot gain survival this settlement phase for any reason. (4-7) Syncope. Gain +3 insanity. (8+) Cured! Gain +6 insanity. You may remove one of the following: - 1 disorder of your choice. - Warped Pelvis severe waist injury. - Inetestinal Prolapse severe waist injury.

name: Sacrification
description: (*) Initiation - Once per lifetime, gain +1 courage and roll the hit location die. (head) Suffer the blinded severe head injury. (body) Gain the Tough fighting art. (waist) Suffer destoryed genitals severe injury. (arms) Gambler's scar. Gain +1 permanent luck. (legs) Roll 1d10, on a result of 6+ you lose some toes, -1 permanent movement.

name: Shrine
description: May be used once per settlement phase. (*) Armor Ritual - roll 1d10. (1-3) Departing survivors gain +1 insanity. (4+) Final adjustments. Departing survivors add 1 (shield) to all hit locations.

name: Lantern Oven
description: Heat. By agitating lantern, a source of Heat becomes available to the settlement. Departing Survivors gain +1 survival.

name: Forbidden Dance
description: (*) Fever Dance - roll 1d10. (1) Clumsy. Suffer -1 permanent movement. (2-9) Give up. Gain +1 insanity. (10+) Forbidden Step. Spend 7 resources and gain +1 permanent evasion.

name: Saga
description: A telling of the settlement's survival, set to a soft rhythmic beating of drums. All newborn surivors gain +2 hunt experience and +2 survival from knowing the epic.

name: Song of the Brave
description: The survivors celebrate life by lifting their voices into the darkness. All non-deaf survivors add +1 t their roll results on the Overwhelming Darkness story event.
